metadata.title: CVE-2017-17670 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In VideoLAN VLC media player through 2.2.8, there is a type conversion vulnerability in modules/demux/mp4/libmp4.c in the MP4 demux module leading to a invalid free, because the type of a box may be changed between a read operation and a free operation.

notes.note: mikesalvatore> According to the openwall thread, "the VLC project probably won't backport a fix to 2.2.x." I'm deferring this CVE.

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.4-2build1').
